markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Fetchling](/Traits.aspx?ID=300)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 308 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

A creature with this trait is a member of the fetchling ancestry. Fetchlings were once human, but generations of life on the [Shadow Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=11) have transformed them.
name: Fetchling
